Description: Defines the mandatory structure for immutable indexing of Sovereign State Commits (Ψ_{N}). This index ensures comprehensive audit chain integrity (TVCR linkage) and facilitates RRP triage, finalized and cryptographically bound by the Sovereign Governor Subsystem (SGS).

EpochID.description: The sequential Deterministic State Evolution ID (Ψ_{N}), guaranteed monotonic and up to 64-bit capacity.

CommitTimestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp (UTC) indicating when the state commit was finalized.

GovernanceRootHash.description: Cryptographic root hash of the entire Governance State Manifest (GSM) for this epoch. Generated using IndexingHashAlgorithm.

GSM_Pointer.description: Immutable storage location pointer (URN/URI) for the GSM artifact.

TVCR_Link.description: Mandatory reference pointer to the Trace and Veto Context Registry (TVCR) artifact, even if the registry itself is null (unanimous transition).

ManifestIntegrityHash.description: The hash of the entire Index structure (excluding the signature field) calculated using IndexingHashAlgorithm.

IndexSignature.description: The SGS cryptographic signature over ManifestIntegrityHash, ensuring non-repudiation.
